quests.achieve_cond_description: Upgrade any weapon after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Upgrade a weapon!
Upgrading a weapon improves its stats and makes it more powerful.
quests.title: Weapon Upgrade

quests.achieve_cond_description: Upgrade any weapon to max level after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Upgrade a weapon to max!
Upgrading a weapon to max allows you to combine it.
You'll need an identical weapon to combine it with, though.
quests.title: Max Weapon Upgrade

quests.achieve_cond_description: Upgrade any armor after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Upgrade a piece of armor!
Upgrading armor improves its stats and makes it more powerful.
quests.title: Armor Upgrade

quests.achieve_cond_description: Upgrade any armor to max level after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Upgrade a piece of armor to max!
Upgrading armor to max allows you to combine it.
You'll need an identical piece of armor to combine it with, though.
quests.title: Max Armor Upgrade

quests.achieve_cond_description: Combine any weapon after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Combine a weapon!
Combining a weapon raises its max upgrade level, allowing you to upgrade it further.
quests.title: Combine Weapon

quests.achieve_cond_description: Max combine any weapon after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Max combine a weapon!
Max combining a weapon raises its rarity by 2 and makes it more powerful.
quests.title: Max Combine Weapon

quests.achieve_cond_description: Combine any armor after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Combine a piece of armor!
Combining armor raises its max upgrade level, allowing you to upgrade it further.
quests.title: Combine Armor

quests.achieve_cond_description: Max combine any armor after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Max combine a piece of armor!
Max combining armor raises its rarity by 2 and makes it more powerful.
quests.title: Max Combine Armor

quests.achieve_cond_description: Acquire 1 or more accessories after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Get an accessory!
Accessories can confer all sorts of bonuses to characters, like raising stats or giving resistance to debuffs.
Accessories are usually obtained as rewards during events.
quests.hint_msg: Check the rewards pages of the available events, find one with an accessory you want, and complete the event!
quests.title: Accessorize

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the Mako Reactor No. 5 dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY VII realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Complete Mako Reactor No. 5 in the FINAL FANTASY VII realm!
Completing Classic dungeons earns you Mythril and Stamina Shards.
Use 5 Mythril to get rare equipment from a Relic Draw.
Collect 5 Stamina Shards to raise your maximum Stamina by 1.
quests.hint_msg:
Air Buster is the boss of the Mako Reactor No. 5 dungeon (VII).
Exploit Air Buster's weakness to lightning to deal extra damage!
quests.title: Complete Mako Reactor No. 5 (VII)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the Zanarkand dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY X realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Complete Zanarkand in the FINAL FANTASY X realm!
Completing Classic dungeons earns you Mythril and Stamina Shards.
Use 5 Mythril to get rare equipment from a Relic Draw.
Collect 5 Stamina Shards to raise your maximum Stamina by 1.
quests.hint_msg:
Sinspawn Ammes is the boss of the Zanarkand dungeon (X).
Ignore the Sinscales that appear with Sinspawn Ammes--they'll keep respawning if you defeat them. Focus your attacks on Sinspawn Ammes itself.
quests.title: Complete Zanarkand (X)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the Mist Cave dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY IV realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Complete Mist Cave in the FINAL FANTASY IV realm!
Completing Classic dungeons earns you Mythril and Stamina Shards.
Use 5 Mythril to get rare equipment from a Relic Draw.
Collect 5 Stamina Shards to raise your maximum Stamina by 1.
quests.hint_msg:
Mist Dragon is the boss of the Mist Cave dungeon (IV).
When Mist Dragon enters its mist form, not only is it immune to all attacks, it launches powerful counterattacks.
Mist Dragon changes forms after a certain number of turns, so be watchful and patient, and time your attacks so they don't land while it's in mist form.
quests.title: Complete Mist Cave (IV)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the Wind Shrine dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY V realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Complete Wind Shrine in the FINAL FANTASY V realm!
Completing Classic dungeons earns you Mythril and Stamina Shards.
Use 5 Mythril to get rare equipment from a Relic Draw.
Collect 5 Stamina Shards to raise your maximum Stamina by 1.
quests.hint_msg:
Wing Raptor is the boss of the Wind Shrine dungeon (V).
Wing Raptor launches a powerful counterattack when struck while its wings are closed.
Wing Raptor changes forms after a certain number of turns, so be watchful and patient, and time your attacks so they don't land while its wings are closed.
quests.title: Complete Wind Shrine (V)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the North Mines dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY VI realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Complete North Mines in the FINAL FANTASY VI realm!
Completing Classic dungeons earns you Mythril and Stamina Shards.
Use 5 Mythril to get rare equipment from a Relic Draw.
Collect 5 Stamina Shards to raise your maximum Stamina by 1.
quests.hint_msg:
Ymir is the boss of the North Mines dungeon (VI).
Ymir launches a powerful counterattack when its shell is struck.
To be sure you don't hit Ymir's shell, avoid using attacks that hit all targets. Ymir also hides in its shell after a certain number of turns, so be watchful and patient, and time your attacks so they don't land on the shell.
quests.title: Complete North Mines (VI)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the Chaos Shrine dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY I realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Complete Chaos Shrine in the FINAL FANTASY I realm!
Completing Classic dungeons earns you Mythril and Stamina Shards.
Use 5 Mythril to get rare equipment from a Relic Draw.
Collect 5 Stamina Shards to raise your maximum Stamina by 1.
quests.hint_msg:
Garland is the boss of the Chaos Shrine dungeon (I).
Garland doesn't use any special attacks, so it's a straightforward fight. If you have trouble beating him, try leveling up your characters, changing or upgrading their equipment, and creating or honing abilities.
quests.title: Complete Chaos Shrine (I)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the Semitt Falls Cavern dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY II realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Complete Semitt Falls Cavern in the FINAL FANTASY II realm!
Completing Classic dungeons earns you Mythril and Stamina Shards.
Use 5 Mythril to get rare equipment from a Relic Draw.
Collect 5 Stamina Shards to raise your maximum Stamina by 1.
quests.hint_msg:
Sergeant is the boss of the Semitt Falls Cavern dungeon (II).
Sergeant doesn't use any special attacks, so it's a straightforward fight. If you have trouble beating him, try leveling up your characters, changing or upgrading their equipment, and creating or honing abilities.
quests.title: Complete Semitt Falls Cavern (II)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the Fire Cavern dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY VIII realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Complete Fire Cavern in the FINAL FANTASY VIII realm!
Completing Classic dungeons earns you Mythril and Stamina Shards.
Use 5 Mythril to get rare equipment from a Relic Draw.
Collect 5 Stamina Shards to raise your maximum Stamina by 1.
quests.hint_msg:
Ifrit is the boss of the Fire Cavern dungeon (VIII).
Exploit Ifrit's weakness to ice to deal extra damage!
And be careful not to use fire attacks--Ifrit will absorb the fire damage and heal!
quests.title: Complete Fire Cavern (VIII)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete The Hanging Edge dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY XIII realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Complete The Hanging Edge in the FINAL FANTASY XIII realm!
Completing Classic dungeons earns you Mythril and Stamina Shards.
Use 5 Mythril to get rare equipment from a Relic Draw.
Collect 5 Stamina Shards to raise your maximum Stamina by 1.
quests.hint_msg:
Manasvin Warmech is the boss of the Hanging Edge dungeon (XIII).
Exploit Manasvin Warmech's weakness to lightning to deal extra damage!
quests.title: Complete The Hanging Edge (XIII)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the Altar Cave dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY III realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Complete Altar Cave in the FINAL FANTASY III realm!
Completing Classic dungeons earns you Mythril and Stamina Shards.
Use 5 Mythril to get rare equipment from a Relic Draw.
Collect 5 Stamina Shards to raise your maximum Stamina by 1.
quests.hint_msg:
Great Tortoise is the boss of the Altar Cave dungeon (III).
Great Tortoise doesn't use any special attacks, so it's a straightforward fight. If you have trouble beating it, try leveling up your characters, changing or upgrading their equipment, and creating or honing abilities.
quests.title: Complete Altar Cave (III)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the M.S. Prima Vista dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY IX realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Complete M.S. Prima Vista in the FINAL FANTASY IX realm!
Completing Classic dungeons earns you Mythril and Stamina Shards.
Use 5 Mythril to get rare equipment from a Relic Draw.
Collect 5 Stamina Shards to raise your maximum Stamina by 1.
quests.hint_msg:
Steiner is the boss of the M.S. Prima Vista dungeon (IX).
You'll face Steiner a number of times, and in the final encounter he'll be accompanied by a bomb.
Focus your attacks on Steiner to bring him down before the bomb goes off!
quests.title: Complete M.S. Prima Vista (IX)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the Nalbina Fortress dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY XII realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Complete Nalbina Fortress in the FINAL FANTASY XII realm!
Completing Classic dungeons earns you Mythril and Stamina Shards.
Use 5 Mythril to get rare equipment from a Relic Draw.
Collect 5 Stamina Shards to raise your maximum Stamina by 1.
quests.hint_msg:
Air Cutter Remora is the boss of the Nalbina Fortress dungeon (XII).
Air Cutter Remora uses attacks that hit the entire party, so bring someone with an ability that heals everyone at once to keep the damage under control!
quests.title: Complete Nalbina Fortress (XII)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the Mako Reactor No. 5 Elite dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY VII realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:

quests.achieve_cond_description: Raise any character from the FINAL FANTASY I realm to level 10 or higher.
quests.description:
Raise a character from FINAL FANTASY I to level 10!
The Warrior of Light is a character from FINAL FANTASY I.
Recruit the Warrior of Light by completing the Cavern of Earth 1 dungeon (I).
When fighting in dungeons from their native realm, characters get a Record Synergy bonus.
The Record Synergy bonus boosts characters' stats and the EXP they earn.
Recruit characters from each realm to have the perfect party ready at a moment's notice!
quests.title: Level 10 Character (FINAL FANTASY I)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Raise any character from the FINAL FANTASY I realm to level 30 or higher.
quests.description:
Raise a character from FINAL FANTASY I to level 30!
When fighting in dungeons from their native realm, characters get a Record Synergy bonus.
The Record Synergy bonus boosts characters' stats and the EXP they earn.
Recruit characters from each realm to have the perfect party ready at a moment's notice!
quests.title: Level 30 Character (FINAL FANTASY I)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Raise any character from the FINAL FANTASY II realm to level 10 or higher.
quests.description:
Raise a character from FINAL FANTASY II to level 10!
Josef and Gordon are characters from FINAL FANTASY II.
Recruit Josef by completing the Snow Cavern dungeon (II), and recruit Gordon by completing the Dreadnought dungeon (II).
Other characters can be recruited in different ways, such as completing events.
When fighting in dungeons from their native realm, characters get a Record Synergy bonus.
The Record Synergy bonus boosts characters' stats and the EXP they earn.
Recruit characters from each realm to have the perfect party ready at a moment's notice!

quests.achieve_cond_description: Raise any character from the FINAL FANTASY VI realm to level 50 or higher.

The Record Synergy bonus boosts characters' stats and the EXP they earn.
Recruit characters from each realm to have the perfect party ready at a moment's notice!

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the black magic ability Blizzard after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the black magic ability Blizzard!
Blizzard is an ice spell, so use it against enemies vulnerable to ice.
quests.title: Create Blizzard (Black Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the black magic ability Fira after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the black magic ability Fira!
Fira is a more powerful version of Fire, so use it against enemies vulnerable to fire.
quests.title: Create Fira (Black Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the black magic ability Blizzara after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the black magic ability Blizzara!
Blizzara is a more powerful version of Blizzard, so use it against enemies vulnerable to ice.
quests.title: Create Blizzara (Black Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the black magic ability Thundara after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the black magic ability Thundara!
Thundara is a more powerful version of Thunder, so use it against enemies vulnerable to lightning.
quests.title: Create Thundara (Black Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the black magic ability Firaga after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the black magic ability Firaga!
Firaga is a more powerful version of Fira, so use it against enemies vulnerable to fire.
quests.title: Create Firaga (Black Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the black magic ability Blizzaga after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the black magic ability Blizzaga!
Blizzaga is a more powerful version of Blizzara, so use it against enemies vulnerable to ice.
quests.title: Create Blizzaga (Black Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the black magic ability Thundaga after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the black magic ability Thundaga!
Thundaga is a more powerful version of Thundara, so use it against enemies vulnerable to lightning.
quests.title: Create Thundaga (Black Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the black magic ability Flare after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the black magic ability Flare!
Flare is a powerful non-elemental spell, ideal for single targets when elemental damage isn't a factor.
quests.title: Create Flare (Black Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the white magic ability Cura after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the white magic ability Cura!
Cura is a more powerful version of Cure that restores HP to your allies.
You can also use Cura to deal damage to undead enemies.
quests.title: Create Cura (White Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the white magic ability Vox after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the white magic ability Vox!
Vox removes Silence from an ally.
Silenced allies can't use any magic, so use Vox to restore their spellcasting ability.
quests.title: Create Vox (White Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the white magic ability Blindna after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the white magic ability Blindna!
Blindna removes Blind from an ally.
Blinded allies have a reduced chance to hit with their attacks, so use Blindna to restore their battle effectiveness.
quests.title: Create Blindna (White Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the white magic ability Curaga after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the white magic ability Curaga!
Curaga is a more powerful version of Cura that restores HP to your allies.
You can also use Curaga to deal damage to undead enemies.
quests.title: Create Curaga (White Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the white magic ability Stona after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the white magic ability Stona!
Stona removes Petrify from an ally.
Petrified allies can't take any actions in battle, so use Stona to get them fighting again.
quests.title: Create Stona (White Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the white magic ability Esuna after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the white magic ability Esuna!
Esuna is a powerful spell that removes all debuffs from an ally.
quests.title: Create Esuna (White Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the white magic ability Holy after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the white magic ability Holy!
Holy is a powerful spell that deals holy damage to a single target.
quests.title: Create Holy (White Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the physical ability Boost after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the physical ability Boost!
Boost temporarily raises the Attack of an ally.
quests.title: Create Boost (Physical Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the physical ability Double Cut after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the physical ability Double Cut!
Double Cut is a powerful ability that deals 2 successive attacks on an enemy.
quests.title: Create Double Cut (Physical Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the physical ability Salve after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the physical ability Salve!
Salve restores HP to the user.
Salve is a convenient ability that your front-line characters can use to heal themselves in a pinch.
quests.title: Create Salve (Physical Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the physical ability Armor Break after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the physical ability Armor Break!
Armor Break deals damage to an enemy and temporarily lowers its Defense.
Armor Break is at its best against bosses with high Defense.
quests.title: Create Armor Break (Physical Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the physical ability Power Break after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the physical ability Power Break!
Power Break deals damage to an enemy and temporarily lowers its Attack.
Power Break is at its best against bosses with high Attack.
quests.title: Create Power Break (Physical Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the physical ability Magic Break after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the physical ability Magic Break!
Magic Break deals damage to an enemy and temporarily lowers its Magic.
Magic Break is at its best against bosses that cast a lot of spells.
quests.title: Create Magic Break (Physical Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the physical ability Barrage after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the physical ability Barrage!
Barrage is a powerful ability that deals less damage than a basic attack, but makes up for this by hitting 4 targets at random.
quests.title: Create Barrage (Physical Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the summon ability Dragon after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the summon ability Dragon!
Summon a Dragon that deals non-elemental damage to all enemies.
quests.title: Create Dragon (Summon Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the summon ability Shiva after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the summon ability Shiva!
Summon Shiva to deal ice damage to all enemies.
quests.title: Create Shiva (Summon Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the summon ability Ramuh after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the summon ability Ramuh!
Summon Ramuh to deal lightning damage to all enemies.
quests.title: Create Ramuh (Summon Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the summon ability Ifrit after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the summon ability Ifrit!
Summon Ifrit to deal fire damage to all enemies.
quests.title: Create Ifrit (Summon Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the dragoon ability Jump after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the dragoon ability Jump!
Jump sends the user into the air for a short time before landing and dealing damage to an enemy.
quests.title: Create Jump (Dragoon Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the spellblade ability Fire Strike after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the spellblade ability Fire Strike!
Fire Strike deals physical fire damage to an enemy, so use it against enemies vulnerable to fire.
quests.title: Create Fire Strike (Spellblade Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the spellblade ability Blizzard Strike after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the spellblade ability Blizzard Strike!
Blizzard Strike deals physical ice damage to an enemy, so use it against enemies vulnerable to ice.
quests.title: Create Blizzard Strike (Spellblade Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the spellblade ability Thunder Strike after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the spellblade ability Thunder Strike!
Thunder Strike deals physical lightning damage to an enemy, so use it against enemies vulnerable to lightning.
quests.title: Create Thunder Strike (Spellblade Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the spellblade ability Fira Strike after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the spellblade ability Fira Strike!
Fira Strike is a more powerful version of Fire Strike that deals physical fire damage to an enemy.
quests.title: Create Fira Strike (Spellblade Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the spellblade ability Blizzara Strike after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the spellblade ability Blizzara Strike!
Blizzara Strike is a more powerful version of Blizzard Strike that deals physical ice damage to an enemy.
quests.title: Create Blizzara Strike (Spellblade Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the spellblade ability Flare Strike after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the spellblade ability Flare Strike!
Flare Strike is a powerful ability that deals physical non-elemental damage to an enemy.
quests.title: Create Flare Strike (Spellblade Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the physical ability Intimidate after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the physical ability Intimidate!
Intimidate has a high chance to Paralyze an enemy.
Taking the time to debuff an enemy early in battle can make the rest of the fight easier.
quests.title: Create Intimidate (Physical Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the physical ability Mental Break after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Create the physical ability Mental Break!
Mental Break deals damage to an enemy and temporarily lowers its Resistance.
Mental Break is at its best against bosses that have weaknesses that can be exploited by magic.
quests.title: Create Mental Break (Physical Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Hone the black magic ability Blizzard after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Hone the black magic ability Blizzard!
Honing an ability increases the number of times you can use it.
quests.title: Hone Blizzard (Black Magic Ability)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Use a Common Relic Draw after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Use a Common Relic Draw!
You get 1 free Common Relic Draw per day.
It's possible for rare equipment to drop, so don't miss your chance!
quests.title: Use a Common Relic Draw

quests.achieve_cond_description: Use a Rare Relic Draw after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Use a Rare Relic Draw!
Rare Relic Draws cost 5 Mythril or Gems.
Rare Relic Draws always drop 3★ or higher equipment, so give it a try!
quests.title: Use a Rare Relic Draw

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the S.S. Liki Elite dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY X realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Restore Tidus's Hero Record and recruit him to your party!
Fulfill the Bonus Quest by completing the S.S. Liki Elite dungeon (X) to add Tidus to your roster.
If you already have Tidus's Hero Record, you'll get a Growth Egg instead.
quests.hint_msg:
Sinspawn Echuilles is the boss of the S.S. Liki dungeon (X).
Sinspawn Echuilles is vulnerable to the Blind debuff.
Blinding Sinspawn Echuilles makes it much easier to avoid its powerful Drain Touch attack!
quests.title: Complete S.S. Liki Elite (X)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the North Mountain Elite dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY V realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Restore Lenna's Hero Record and recruit her to your party!
Fulfill the Bonus Quest by completing the North Mountain Elite dungeon (V) to add Lenna to your roster.
If you already have Lenna's Hero Record, you'll get a Growth Egg instead.
quests.hint_msg:
Magissa and Forza are the bosses of the North Mountain dungeon (V).
Magissa is vulnerable to Silence, and Forza is vulnerable to Sleep.
Use Silence and Sleep to shut down their magic and physical attacks!
quests.title: Complete North Mountain Elite (V)

quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the Midgar Highway Elite dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY VII realm after accepting the quest.
quests.description:
Restore Sephiroth's Hero Record and recruit him to your party!
Fulfill the Bonus Quest by completing the Midgar Highway Elite dungeon (VII) to add Sephiroth to your roster.
If you already have Sephiroth's Hero Record, you'll get a Growth Egg instead.
quests.hint_msg:
Motor Ball is the boss of the Midgar Highway dungeon (VII).
Motor Ball uses multi-target attacks one after another. Exploit its weakness to lightning to bring it down fast!
quests.title: Complete Midgar Highway Elite (VII)
